GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You've got guts, but I still wouldn't go
near the <clr:0000>Coliseum Ruins <clr:ffff>if I were you.<sp:0:4:0>There's some kind of three-headed
monster in there that spits <clr:0000>lightning <clr:ffff>at
whoever gets close.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>The Coliseum Ruins are inside the rocky
mountain opposite Outskirt Stable. But
it's much safer to stay around here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>You wouldn't catch me in those ruins,
even if I had <clr:0000>lightning-proof gear<clr:ffff>.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Need somethin'? <sp:5:1:0>Maybe you noticed the
Zonai Survey Team uniform?<sp:0:4:0>We do know this area pretty well, since
we've been assigned to investigate here.<sp:0:4:0>Since you asked—or were about to—I'll
let you in on some exciting news.
Near_BackRange_02: I wonder if it's up there.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Sanidin Park Ruins<clr:ffff> is north of here on the
road. <sp:5:1:0>Be warned though. <clr:0000>Skeletal horses<clr:ffff>
are said to <clr:0000>roam the ruins at night<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Why not go east to <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>
instead? Nice scenery, good people,
fewer skeletons.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Then again, you seem brave enough to
think bone horses are a draw. <sp:5:0:0>Probably
already wondering if you can ride one.
StartPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL>Wait. Is that horse made of...<sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>bones<clr:ffff>?!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>No! Nope! Nuh-uh! <sp:5:1:0>I saw nothing!
Nothing at all!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Go east down the road for <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
or north to get to the <clr:0000>Sanidin Park Ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Although I personally avoid the ruins
at <clr:0000>night<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I've heard <clr:0000>skeletal horses<clr:ffff> show up there
after dark, and I've got no desire to find
out for myself whether it's true.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You look like a brave boy though.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>I bet you're already wondering to yourself
if <clr:0000>skeletal horses<clr:ffff> are real, and if so,
whether you can ride one.
StartPoint_01_4:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0000>When I asked him to ride a skeletal horse, I was
just kidding...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_00>These things give me the creeps.<sp:5:1:0> I can't bring myself
to look them in the eyes.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wanna share my shelter from the rain?
I've got room to spare.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>That was scary! I was waaay out of my
element there.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Keep an eye out for <clr:0000>chasms <clr:ffff>around here
so you don't fall in.<sp:0:4:0>These <clr:0000>chasms <clr:ffff>are gaping holes cropping
up all over Hyrule. <sp:5:0:0>We don't know much
about them, except that they're bad news.<sp:0:4:0>We suspect that there might be a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>
at <clr:0000>the top of this high wall<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>But how would the researchers who told
us about it have gotten up there? <sp:5:1:0>Unless
there's another entrance...
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Farther along the road to the southeast,
there's a place called the <clr:0000>birthplace of
Hyrule<clr:ffff>, but it's blocked by a high cliff.<sp:0:4:0>The portcullis that might have been the
intended entrance has crumbled, so
there's no getting in anymore.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>We think that if we could <clr:0000>climb to the top
of that castle wall<clr:ffff>, we'd find a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff> at
the top. <sp:5:1:0>But there's no way to be sure.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Been to the <clr:0000>Coliseum Ruins <clr:ffff>before?<sp:0:4:0>They're opposite Outskirt Stable, inside
the rocky mountain, but I hear they're
occupied by a <clr:0000>big monster<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>Some kind of three-headed beast that
breathes <clr:0000>lightning <clr:ffff>at you if you get close.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Sounds like a bad time to me, even if I
had lightning-proof gear. I think I'll stick
to research, thanks.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS>You won't catch me sticking my neck out
for my work, no sir.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Phew. That could've been bad! Thanks
for rescuing me.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>That was so scary. But somehow we
pulled it out of the bag...
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>I heard from my sources that there's a big
hole around here. What we call a chasm.

I'm here both to study said chasm and to
get the word out so people don't slip and
fall in.
I suspect it's at the top of that wall,
but there's no way to verify that without
climbing up there.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Not that anyone will be doing that!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Phew. That was dangerous. I thought my
days of spreading rumors were done.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Chasms <clr:ffff>are gaping holes cropping up all
over Hyrule. We're still researching them,
but we know they're dangerous.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>We suspect that there might be a <clr:0000>chasm<clr:ffff>
at <clr:0000>the top of this high wall<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>But how would the researchers who told
us about it have gotten up there? <sp:5:1:0>Unless
there's another entrance...
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Rain makes it hard to see and even harder
to climb. <sp:5:0:0>No point in trying to do either
until the weather clears.<sp:0:4:0>That's why I'm taking a little break. <sp:5:0:0>Why
try to power through and risk getting
injured with nothing to show for it?
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>...Ow. That was too much for my meager
fighting skills.
